In this task, you will be presented with an image of an inside or outside of a house pattern tiles. Your task is to respond whether the image is an inside or outside pattern.
If the image is an inside, press [IN_BUTTON] with your dominant hand.
If the image is an outside, press [OUT_BUTTON] with your dominant hand.
Please respond as quickly and accurately as possible.
Press either button to begin when you are ready.
